name: The Last Sorrow
description:
"Wake up Young Sorrow......"

You are the Last of the Sorrow, a small group of humans living on the brink of extinction in a harsh and dangerous world that your kind once ruled over.

Fight your way out of the Ancient Fortress in which you have been held prisoner for so long. Escape the Prison and find the other Sorrows....

"There is much to do......"

The Last Sorrow is currently under development so the Prototype features 4 sections of a much larger level.

Just some tips with the Prototype itself :

- Take your time with the combat. If you don't use your shield you will die quite fast. So try balance out the combination of sword and shield.

- Your health goes back to full at the start of each section. This is just to keep people playing for now, but will be removed in the future.

- As for the Boss. He can incredibly tricky and unfair at first. Try and learn his patterns and be patient. He's a lot easier than he appears to be.

Programming/Art/Story : Dan Mc Grath

Music : Jim Mc Grath
